1.1.0.name: wordpress/editionguard-ebook-sales-with-drm
1.1.0.description:
This plugin is a complete eBook sales solution, which is fully integrated with our cost-effective EditionGuard DRM service.

By following just a few simple steps, you can immediately start selling your eBooks on your Wordpress site using Paypal and Moneybookers, with industry standard eBook DRM protection. Click here to watch intro screencast on Youtube

  1. Login to your admin interface and install the plugin.
  2. Enter your EditionGuard, Paypal and Moneybookers credentials through the admin interface.
  3. Upload your eBooks through the admin interface.
  4. Easily generate and place short codes into your posts.
  5. Start making money!

Once your customers select one of your eBooks and make payment for it through either Paypal or Moneybookers, they’ll automatically receive instru
